title: decentrasoft
author: decentrasoft
content: Hello all,As a software company, we have some available crypto assets we can lend. We can lend money for a business, personal funds, or another investment.Terms:1. Collateral is needed for each loan we lend. We are open to collateral not only in crypto.2. We can accept or reject any loan application.3. We can use escrow for the accepted loan, but escrow fees are yours if they are any. Another way is using a smart contract provided by us or provided by you and reviewed and verified by our team.4. If you fail to repay on time then we can negotiate a penalty rate in the range of 3-6% depending on your delay.5. If you don't pay on time and we haven't discussed a reprieve your collateral will be sold.6. If the loan is requested for a business you should provide financial reports or other documentation for the income and growth.7. Loans can be lent in  BTC/USDT/ETH/ADA/MATIC/TRX.8. Loans can be lent from 1 month to 36 months.Application method:Loan Amount:Loan Purpose:Loan Repay Amount:Loan Repay Date:Type of Collateral:Escrow profile Link:Bitcoin Address:

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote8. Loans can be lent from 1 month to 36 months.Does this mean you won't consider micro loans of less than a week?

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on August 12, 2022, 08:56:19 AMQuote8. Loans can be lent from 1 month to 36 months.Does this mean you won't consider micro loans of less than a week?It depends of the amount and collateral, we can consider micro loans

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Hi! What is the minimum and maximum loan amount you issue?

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 12, 2022, 09:47:45 PMHi! What is the minimum and maximum loan amount you issue?There is no minimum, the maximum we can issue is 65 BTC

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: decentrasoft on August 13, 2022, 02:55:49 AMThere is no minimum, the maximum we can issue is 65 BTCWhat is your loan interest rate?

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 13, 2022, 05:57:33 AMQuote from: decentrasoft on August 13, 2022, 02:55:49 AMThere is no minimum, the maximum we can issue is 65 BTCWhat is your loan interest rate?Depending of the loan 4-7%

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: decentrasoft on August 13, 2022, 11:53:22 AMDepending of the loan 4-7%Will you ever issue loans without collateral?

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.created_time: August 14, 2022, 12:48:16 AMLast edit: August 14, 2022, 10:28:15 AM by decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 13, 2022, 07:57:30 PMQuote from: decentrasoft on August 13, 2022, 11:53:22 AMDepending of the loan 4-7%Will you ever issue loans without collateral?No. But we can consider different types of collateral. You can offer anything and if it’s relative for us, we can accept it.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: decentrasoft on August 14, 2022, 12:48:16 AMNo. But we can consider different types of collateral. You can offer anything and if it’s relative for us, we can accept it.Do these terms apply only to newbie or to all forum members? Most lenders give unsecured loans, but only to members with merit

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 14, 2022, 06:10:32 PMQuote from: decentrasoft on August 14, 2022, 12:48:16 AMNo. But we can consider different types of collateral. You can offer anything and if it’s relative for us, we can accept it.Do these terms apply only to newbie or to all forum members? Most lenders give unsecured loans, but only to members with meritThe rules are for everyone, no exceptions.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: decentrasoft on August 12, 2022, 07:39:30 AM~This looks like nothing but an attempt to scam people out of their collateral, or obtain identifying documentation for nefarious purposes.  If you're looking for a collateralized loan, you won't have any problem getting one from the reputable and experienced lenders on this forum.  I suggest you avoid this shady offer, made by an obvious tool phishing for a scam.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Minimum and maximum one can loan?

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on October 17, 2022, 09:05:00 PMMinimum and maximum one can loan?Minimum 0.0001 BTC or the equivalent in another crypto, maximum is 4 BTC.
